title: The Faceless Lady
overview: Step inside Kilolc castle, a magnificent stone fortress deep in the Irish countryside and home to the infamous 'Faceless Lady', a tragic spirit doomed to walk the crumbling manor for eternity. But her story is far from over, as three young couples are about to discover. Drawn to the castle by its mysterious owner, they have come to compete in historic Games. The winner shall inherit Kilolc Castle, and all that lies within itâ€¦ both the living, and the dead.
